citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
A teaching protocol was in renewal, but not yet approved by the IACUC and 4 animals were utilized on the expired
protocol for three days of covered activity in a class only offered in a single quarter. The expiration of the protocol was
discovered approximately a month later during renewal review and the investigator was advised to cease all activity and
transfer any current animals to a currently approved holding protocol.
Corrected at the time of inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with IACUC staff and Attending Veterinarian.
Additional Inspectors:
William Campbell, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.31(c)(6) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
A teaching protocol was in renewal, but not yet approved by the IACUC and 4 animals were utilized on the expired 
protocol for three days of covered activity in a class only offered in a single quarter.  The expiration of the protocol was 
discovered approximately a month later during renewal review and the investigator was advised to cease all activity and 
transfer any current animals to a currently approved holding protocol. 
 
Corrected at the time of inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with IACUC staff and Attending Veterinarian. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
William Campbell, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
